00023 //
00024 // Flush the buffer and copy the string from begin to end to the buffer.
00025 //
00026 static const char *const substr(const char * begin, 
00027                 const char * end, 
00028                 char * buf, 
00029                 int bufsize) throw()
00030 {
00031     try{
00032         std::fill(buf, buf+bufsize, '\0');
00033         std::copy(begin, end, buf);
00034     }
00035     catch(...)
00036     {
00037         cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00038         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::substr() shall not throw." << endl;
00039       cerr << "System terminates..." << endl;
00040         abort();
00041     }
00042     return buf;
00043 }

00066 SpkCompilerException::SpkCompilerException( enum SpkCompilerError::ErrorCode code, const char* message, unsigned int line, const char* filename) throw()
00067 : myCnt(0)
00068 {
00069     if( full() )
00070     {
00071       cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00072       cerr << "The error list is full." << endl;
00073       cerr << "System terminates..." << endl;
00074       abort();
00075     }
00076     SpkCompilerError e(code, message, line, filename);
00077     myError_list[myCnt] = e;
00078     ++myCnt;
00079 }

00108 SpkCompilerException::SpkCompilerException( const SpkCompilerException& e ) throw()
00109 : myCnt(0)
00110 {
00111     try{
00112         //strcpy(_format, e._format);
00113         for(int i=0; i<e.myCnt; i++ )
00114         {
00115             myError_list[i] = e.myError_list[i];
00116         }
00117     }
00118     catch(...)
00119     {
00120         cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00121         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::SpkCompilerException(const SpkCompilerException&) shall not throw." << endl;
00122         cerr << "System terminates..." << endl;
00123         abort();
00124     }
00125     myCnt = e.myCnt;
00126 }

00153       cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;

00178 const SpkCompilerError SpkCompilerException::pop() throw()
00179 {
00180     if( empty() )
00181     {
00182         cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00183         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::pop() tried to pop from an empty list...";
00184         cerr << "terminating..." << endl;
00185         abort();
00186     }
00187     return myError_list[--myCnt];
00188 }
00189 const SpkCompilerError& SpkCompilerException::operator[](int index) const throw()
00190 {
00191     if( index > myCnt || index < 0 )
00192     {
00193         cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00194         cerr << "SpkCompilerException::operator[] failed." << endl;
00195         cerr << "System terminates..." << endl;
00196         abort();
00197     }
00198     return myError_list[index];
00199 }

00201 unsigned int SpkCompilerException::size() const throw()

00205 bool SpkCompilerException::full() const throw()
00206 {
00207     if( myCnt >= SpkCompilerException::maxErrors() )
00208         return true;
00209     else 
00210         return false;
00211 }
00212 bool SpkCompilerException::empty() const throw()
00213 {
00214     if( myCnt == 0 )
00215         return true;
00216     else
00217         return false;
00218 }

00223 int SpkCompilerException::find( const enum SpkCompilerError::ErrorCode code ) const throw()
00224 {
00225     for( int i=0; i<myCnt; i++ )
00226     {
00227         if( myError_list[i].code() == code )
00228         {
00229             return i;
00230         }
00231     }
00232     return -1;
00233 }
00234 int SpkCompilerException::findFile( const char* filename ) const throw()
00235 {
00236     for( int i=0; i<myCnt; i++ )
00237     {
00238         if( strcmp(myError_list[i].filename(), filename) == 0 )
00239         {
00240             return i;
00241         }
00242     }
00243     return -1;
00244 }

00246 const std::string SpkCompilerException::getXml() const
00247 {
00248     ostringstream o;
00249     o << "<error_list length=\"" << this->size() << "\">" << endl;
00250     for( int i=0; i<this->size(); i++)
00251     {
00252         o << myError_list[i].getXml();
00253     }
00254     o << "</error_list>" << endl;
00255     return o.str();
00256 }

00258 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const SpkCompilerException& e)
00259 {
00260     stream.flush();
00261     stream << "count" << endl;
00262     stream << e.size() << endl;
00263     for( int i=0; i<e.size(); i++)
00264     {
00265       stream << e.myError_list[i];
00266     }
00267     stream.flush();
00268     return stream;
